author: Adam Jeffery
title: Coronavirus-themed murals from around the world
description: Artists are tapping into their creativity to help deal with the impact of the virus.
content:
Artists around the world are tapping their creativity to help find new ways to deal with the impact of the global pandemic.
Musicians who had to cancel their concert tours are instead moving online to connect with their audiences, offering impromptu performa… [+467 chars]
